Text: OK folks I thought id add this in ,I have 100mbps fiber optic so you're at the mercy of your isp. Thats 10 MB/sec up an down, so let it fly.
It says 1080i in the title, so is this still interlaced?  And your detailed information says 29.970fps even though the true framerate of the show is 23.970fps.
It was recorded in USA all 1080i is 29.97 or 30 fps here. 720p is 59.97 or 60 also, an I deinterlaced it during encoding.
